text:
Hello Everybody,
I am checking themes from the marketplace, however I cannot see "the design tab" working.
Has anybody else experienced this problem ?
cc <@U7SL518D6>
Hi Sercan, does this happen with multiple themes or only one specific?

Hello <@UBT0AHWLD>,
I tested a few themes not only one, I have faced same problem.
Have you already installed a new one?
If you install a theme now I believe it will happen for you as well. Old installations don't seem to have a problem, though.

If I Install one of such old themes into another portal that I Ä±nstalled previously into my original portal, the same problem occurs as well. My guess is that this problem happens for the new downloads only.
Clarifying are you seeing this for themes or template packs? Template packs would not have theme settings.

Thats a combination of the two terms. 

For clarification heres an example of a theme <https://marketplace.HubSpot.com/products/design-with-speed/clean-6-1-theme|https://marketplace.HubSpot.com/products/design-with-speed/clean-6-1-theme>

This is a template pack <https://marketplace.HubSpot.com/products/design-with-speed/clean-premium-pack|https://marketplace.HubSpot.com/products/design-with-speed/clean-premium-pack>

Hey <@U7SL518D6> Thanks a lot for the examples! The idea for me is to use the design tab for the themes that I installed from the marketplace. The template pack does not have such a feature, which I am aware of :)
